channel.title: Levenshtein Distance on
channel.description: Recent content in Levenshtein Distance on

item.title: The LUX Score: A Metric for Lipidome Homology
item.description: LUX Score is an unbiased metric to measure global differences between a pair of lipidomes. It is based on structural similarity between constituent lipids. It is a distance measure, always between 0 and 1, indicating complete-similarity and complete-dissimilarity respectively
